intro_success.title: Study Successful
intro_success.description: You managed to focus for a few hours. The material is dry, but you feel a sense of accomplishment. You found a receipt in the textbook.

intro_fail.title: Distracted
intro_fail.description: You tried to study, but without the textbook, you just stared at the wall. Your anxiety grows.

coffee_break.title: Caffeinated
coffee_break.description: The bitter liquid warms your soul. You feel ready to take on the world, or at least one more hour of calculus.

art_therapy.title: Art Therapy
art_therapy.description: You paint your feelings. It's messy, but it helps clear your mind.

art_practice.title: Studio Time
art_practice.description: You work on your technique. You produced some decent sketches. A new opportunity for your hobby has opened up.

board_decay.title: Overwhelmed
board_decay.description: The task was left unattended for too long. It weighs on your mind, draining your mental state.

study_note.title: Suspicious Note Found
study_note.description: While studying, you find a cryptic note tucked between pages of your textbook. It mentions strange occurrences around campus buildings.

shovel_success.title: Hard Work Pays Off
shovel_success.description: You finish shoveling snow from the campus pathways. Your roommate walks by, thanks you awkwardly, and hands you some cash from the work program. They seem nervous and wet, like they've just come from somewhere damp. You file the observation away.

shovel_fail.title: Slipped and Fell
shovel_fail.description: You neglected to shovel the snow in time. Walking to class, you slipped on ice and bruised your ego (and your tailbone).

lecture_success.title: Met a Classmate
lecture_success.description: During the lecture, you strike up a conversation with another student. They mention they've heard strange rumors about flooding and water damage in Mordridge Hall, one of the oldest buildings on campus. 'Something weird is definitely going on there,' they say nervously.

roommate_store.title: Roommate's Stash
roommate_store.description: Your roommate has a surprising collection of energy drinks and coffee. You trade some cash for a caffeine boost.

rumor_map.title: The Secret Below
rumor_map.description: The rumors about a hidden basement laboratory in Mordridge Hall become clearer. The classmate and group partner both mention the same thing: there's a restricted area beneath Mordridge that nobody talks about. You sketch out a map showing where it might be.

flooding_map.title: The Mordridge Connection
flooding_map.description: Your group partner shares troubling news: there have been repeated flooding incidents specifically in Mordridge Hall's lower levels. The pattern is too deliberate to be natural. Someone—or something—is causing this. This is the key evidence you need.

mystery_stakes.title: The Prize
mystery_stakes.description: You overhear administrators discussing the Mordridge situation in panic. Nobody can figure out what's causing the flooding, and they're desperate for answers. They've made an unusual offer: anyone who can identify and prove who or what is behind the incidents gets a full A in all their classes. This mystery just became your top priority.

map_footprints.title: Wet Tracks in Mordridge
map_footprints.description: You explore Mordridge Hall's basement with your map in hand. Your heart races when you spot them: strange, wet footprints leading away from the lower levels. They're large and oddly shaped—definitely not a normal student's tracks.

footprints_door.title: The Hidden Laboratory
footprints_door.description: The footprints lead directly to a concealed door in Mordridge's basement wall. It's clearly been used recently—water still drips from the frame. The door is locked, but now you know exactly where the water is coming from: some kind of secret lab!

door_lab.title: The Wereshark Experiment
door_lab.description: The key opens the hidden door. Your worst fears are confirmed: inside is an underground experimental laboratory, filled with aquariums containing bizarre aquatic creatures. One tank has a nameplate that reads: 'EXPERIMENT SUBJECT - [Your Roommate's Name].' They're the subject, not the researcher.

wereshark_lab.title: The Final Piece
wereshark_lab.description: You uncover detailed research files in the lab. The transformation was incomplete—your roommate escaped the experiments months ago, but they're still transforming. They've been hiding in Mordridge's basement ever since, trying desperately to destroy the lab and erase evidence. The flooding incidents were their failed attempts to destroy it all. Now you have everything you need for an accusation.

accuse_correct.title: CASE SOLVED!
accuse_correct.description: You confront your roommate with the evidence. They confess - the wereshark experiments transformed them, and the flooding was their failed attempts to destroy the lab. The authorities take them away. You've solved the mystery!

accuse_wrong.title: False Accusation
accuse_wrong.description: You accused the wrong person! They're furious and everyone thinks you're losing your mind. Your sanity takes a massive hit from the embarrassment and doubt.

study_success.title: CS559 Study Session Complete
study_success.description: You complete your study session with the textbook. As you pack up, you notice a strange note tucked inside—something about unusual activity at Mordridge Hall. You also spot a flyer for an upcoming campus lecture on emerging research projects.

guard_key.title: Access Granted
guard_key.description: You slip the guard some cash. They look around nervously before handing you a worn brass key. 'This opens maintenance areas in Mordridge Hall,' they whisper. 'But I never gave it to you. And watch yourself down there—something feels wrong about that building.'

guard_rumor_fail.title: Unprofessional Conduct
guard_rumor_fail.description: The guard glares at you as you try to share campus rumors with college faculty. 'I'm not interested in gossip, student. This is highly unprofessional.' You feel embarrassed and your reputation takes a hit.
